Question:

Question:
Tērā pea ka tukuna atu he tāke i whakaritea ki tētahi kaiwhakarato ki te kaihoko i te āhua o te utu mēnā ka nui ake te utu
A.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
B.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
C.Ko te tāwari utu o te tono he tāwariwari wae.
D.He tino tāwari te āhua o te tono.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko:

A. He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.

Ko te tikanga o tēnei kōrero, mēnā ka tukuna atu he tāke i whakaritea ki tētahi kaiwhakarato ki te kaihoko, ā, ka nui ake te utu, ka tino tāwari te utu o te tono. Ko te "tāwari" i konei e tohu ana ki te huringa nui o te tono i runga i te huringa iti o te utu.

Question:
Na te rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona, ko tēhea o ngā takirua UCS me te CS e whai ake nei te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako?
A.mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B.kai, kai, inu rānei
C.nekehanga me te tumeke
D.whiunga me nga utu
GivenAnswer:
I te rangahau rongonui a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona (taste aversion learning), i kitea e rāua he tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako o te takirua kai (UCS) me te pānga kino pēnei i te mate (CS). Ko tēnei momo ako e mōhiotia ana ko te "Garcia effect" rānei "conditioned taste aversion."

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:

B. kai, kai, inu rānei

Question:
Ko tēhea tirohanga ā-hinengaro i tino manakohia i te wā o te rua tekau tau i Ūropi ki te Uru?
A.pūtaiao
B.wairangi
C.kai whanonga
D.ā-hinengaro
GivenAnswer: Ko te tirohanga ā-hinengaro i tino manakohia i te wā o te rua tekau tau i Ūropi ki te Uru ko te A. pūtaiao. I taua wā, i te wā o te Whakatūnga Pūtaiao (Scientific Revolution) me te Whakatūnga Mātauranga (Enlightenment), i tino arohia te pūtaiao me ngā tikanga rangahau pūtaiao hei huarahi mō te mārama ki te ao me te whakawhanake i ngā mātauranga hou.

Question:
He aha te whakaeke purei anō?
A.Ina whakautu te kaihōia ki tētahi karere i tukua e te pūnaha
B.He whakaeke e tārua tonu ana, e tirotiro ana mo te ngoikoretanga
C.He whakaeke e whakamahi ana i ngā karere ake o te pūnaha, ā, kāore e taea te tiaki ki
D.Ka tukuna anō e te kaihōia tētahi karere hopukina, ā, ka whakaae te pae ki tōna pae, ā, ka urupare ki te manakohanga o te kaihōia
GivenAnswer:
B. He whakaeke e tārua tonu ana, e tirotiro ana mo te ngoikoretanga

Ko te whakaeke purei anō he momo whakaeke rorohiko e tārua ana i ngā mahi o mua, pērā i te tukunga o ngā karere, hei kimi i ngā ngoikoretanga o te pūnaha. Ka whakamahia tēnei tikanga e ngā kaiwhakatuma ki te kimi huarahi hei uru atu ki te pūnaha, mā te whakamahi anō i ngā raraunga kua hopukina i mua.

Question:
E pāngia ana e te tūroro he kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o nga vertebra.
A.Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.
B.Ka āhei anake rātau ki te hā mārire.
C.E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.
D.Ka kore e pāngia te mea nui.
GivenAnswer:
A.Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.

Ko te kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o nga vertebra (C6) ka taea te pānga nui ki te kaha o te tangata ki te whakangā. Ko te taumata C6 kei te taha o runga o te tuaiwi, ā, ka pāngia ngā uaua me ngā pūnaha e whakahaere ana i te manawa me te whakangā. Nā reira, ka hiahiatia pea te tautoko ora mō te whakangā.

Question:
Kei tēnei utauta mākete me te utauta whakawhitiwhiti he poapoa hāngai, he tohutohu rānei hei whakahau i ngā kiritaki kia hoko hua/ratonga:
A.Pānuitanga.
B.Te pānga tūmatanui.
C.Whakatairanga hoko.
D.Mākete hāngai.

A. Pānuitanga.

Ko te pānuitanga he utauta mākete me te utauta whakawhitiwhiti e poapoa hāngai ana, e tuku tohutohu rānei hei whakahau i ngā kiritaki kia hoko hua/ratonga. Ka whakamahia te pānuitanga ki te whakatūpato, ki te whakamōhio, ki te poipoi hoki i ngā kiritaki mō tētahi hua, ratonga, waitohu rānei.

Question:

B.He tītaha tiaki i a ia anō.
C.he mawhitiwhiti mana o waho.

Ko tēnei ariā e pā ana ki te wā ka whakapono te tangata kāore rātou e taea te whakahaere i ngā āhuatanga o tō rātou ao, ā, nā reira ka kore rātou e kaha ki te mahi i ngā mahi hei whakapai ake i tō rātou āhuatanga. Ka rongo rātou i te kore āwhina, ā, ka noho pērā ahakoa he aha ngā rerekētanga ka puta i tō rātou ao.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whakatau ana i te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga anō i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, he iti iho te tika i ngā manawa o te pānga i runga anō i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous?
A.Ngā irakētanga nui
B.Ngā tāruatanga ira
C.Ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira
D.Whakawhiti-atu
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko:

A. Ngā irakētanga nui

Ko ngā irakētanga nui (major mutations) e whakatau ana i te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga anō i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, ā, he iti iho te tika i ngā manawa o te pānga i runga anō i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous. Ko ngā irakētanga nui ka taea te huri i te raupapa waikawa amino, ā, ka pā nui ki te hanganga me te mahi o te pūmua.

Question:
Ka taea e te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o ngā phosphates pūngao tiketike, te ATP me te phosphocreatine, te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te:
A.1-2 hēkona.
B.5-10 hēkona.
C.30-40 hēkona.
D.50-60 hēkona.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o ngā phosphates pūngao tiketike, pērā i te ATP me te phosphocreatine, ka taea te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te:

B. 5-10 hēkona.

Ko te pūnaha pūngao ATP-phosphocreatine (ATP-PC) e whakarato ana i te pūngao mō ngā mahi tino kaha, engari he poto noa te wā e taea ai te tautoko i taua taumata mahi. I te nuinga o te wā, ka taea e tēnei pūnaha te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te 5 ki te 10 hēkona i mua i te pau o ngā rauemi pūngao.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
"I roto i te mea ko te ngako o ngā mea i mōhiotia, ko te hunga e whakatū ana i o rātau whakaaro mo te take me te tikanga, me te whakaaro whakaaro o te iwi o Hihi e whakaae ana ko te tikanga tahito o te whakawhānuitanga, te whakawhānuitanga, me te pana i te mahi kino, ko te take o to tātau hiahia whakanui, he "whakapono whakapono he wikitōria mo te Faith of God the Beneficent"; Na, e ai ki nga kupu a te Poropiti, Kia tau te rangimarie ki a ia "Ko te tangata e whakamōhio ana i ngā mahi kino ki roto i tā mātou raupapa me pei" ā, "Ko wai e mahi ana ki tā mātou raupapa me peia," kua tika te mahi, ā, kua tino nui te mahi.
Reta mai i Ottoman Sultan Selim I ki Safavid Shah Wāwhara I, 1514
I tāia e nga Safavids te ire o nga rangatiratanga ā-Rangi pēnei i te Ottoman me ngā Emepera Mughal i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea ko nga Safavids
A.he rangatiratanga whakawhānui i waenganui i ērā atu whakawhānuitanga e rua
B.i whakakāhoretia nga pae matua o te Islam
C.Ngā Karaitiana kua whakawhāititia, a, ka huri i a rātau hai kairiri Safavid
D.I karanga a Wāwhara he Caliph a ia
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko te:
A. he rangatiratanga whakawhānui i waenganui i ērā atu whakawhānuitanga e rua

Ko ngā Safavids he rangatiratanga nui i waenganui i ngā rangatiratanga Ottoman me ngā Emepera Mughal. I te nuinga o te wā, i te wā o te riri me te whakataetae i waenganui i ēnei rangatiratanga, i pā te ire o ngā rangatiratanga ā-Rangi pēnei i te Ottoman me ngā Emepera Mughal ki ngā Safavids.

Question:
E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals
B.He tauira whakarerekē i roto i nga residuals
C.He matapōkere katoa i roto i nga residuals
D.Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore
GivenAnswer:
Ko te kōwhiringa e tika ana mō te pātai "E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?" ko te kōwhiringa D: "Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore."

I roto i te horopaki o te tātaritanga raraunga, ina koa i roto i te tātaritanga rārangi (regression analysis), ko ngā residuals e tata ana ki te kore e tohu ana i tētahi tauira pai. Ko tēnei e kīia ana he tauira pai nā te mea e whakaatu ana ngā residuals kāore he tauira mārama, he matapōkere hoki ngā hapa, ā, kāore he tauira cyclical, he tauira whakarerekē rānei.

Question:
Ko te kōhuru ture rānei i mahia e te Minita whenua X ki rāwāhi he mahi whakarihariha, he gestionis rānei?
A.He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga (he imperii)
B.E kore rawa taua whanonga e kawe i te āraitanga
C.He mahi tūmataiti taua whanonga (he gestionis)
D.He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga, engari e whakangungua ana e te āraitanga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te kōhuru ture rānei i mahia e te Minita whenua X ki rāwāhi he mahi whakarihariha, he gestionis rānei?

A. He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga (he imperii)
B. E kore rawa taua whanonga e kawe i te āraitanga
C. He mahi tūmataiti taua whanonga (he gestionis)
D. He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga, engari e whakangungua ana e te āraitanga

Ko te whakautu tika ko te:

B. E kore rawa taua whanonga e kawe i te āraitanga

Ko te kōhuru he mahi tino kino, ā, ahakoa he mahi tūmatanui, he mahi tūmataiti rānei, kāore e taea te āraitanga i raro i te ture.

Question:
I whakatauritetia ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū i ngā whenua pērā i Ingarangi me Iharaira, he maha ōna pūnaha rōpū maha, ko nga rōpū tōrangapū o Amerika
A.iti iho te āro ki te whakaawe i te hua o te pōti
B.iti iho te tāutu ki ngā ariā tōrangapū ōrite
C.iti iho te pai ki te kohi moni mai i nga kaitautoko tōrangapū
D.pai ake te whakaata i ngā whāinga o ō rātou taiwhanga whakatūtū katoa
GivenAnswer:

I te United States, he pūnaha rōpū e rua te nuinga, ā, ko te nuinga o ngā pōti ka whakataetae i waenga i te Rōpū Reipa me te Rōpū Manapori. Question:

B.Mā te Placing i te ruma i roto i tētahi kāpata kati, whakapouri mo te roanga o te wehenga poaka
C.E mau ana i ngā karapu kirikau me te hipoki i te ihu me te mangai ki te hīpoki korakora

Question:
Kua whakatokatia ētahi o te wai o Mars i roto i te oneone, ā, ko ngā pūmatua hukapapa, ā, i ngaro ētahi nā te tīhore hau kōmaru, engari ko te nuinga o te wai taketake e whakaarotia ana kua ngaro i tētahi atu tikanga. He aha i pā ki tēnei wai "kotahi"?
A.I tangohia atu e te papa hautō i te tere o te hekenga o te kaha
B.I pakaru ki te hauwai me te hāora e te rama ultraviolet, ā, i ngaro te hauwai i roto i te putanga wera
C.i pau i te iwi o nga Tāngata matewai
D.I werohia i te wā o te puia kaha, a, ka ngaro ki te mokowā i roto i te mawhititanga wera
GivenAnswer:

Ko te nuinga o te wai taketake o Mars e whakaarotia ana kua ngaro nā te tukanga o te rama ultraviolet o te Rā. Ka pakaru te wai (H₂O) ki te hauwai (H) me te hāora (O). Nā te mea he māmā ake te hauwai, ka taea e ngā ngota hauwai te mawhiti atu i te kaha o te āwhā o Mars, ā, ka ngaro ki te mokowā. Question:

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
I te tuatahi me kōrero tātau he āhua tūturu nga cosmos, nā te mea he tino tika tēnei puka e hiahia ana ki te kore he hononga, ko te tino katoa, ko tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te āhua tino ātaahua, e tino pai ana ki te pupuri me te pupuri i ngā mea katoa; Na, ko nga wahi rangatira katoa o te ao nui, ara ko te ra, ko te marama me nga aorangi e puta mai ana i tenei ahua Nā te mea rānei e tohe ana ngā mea katoa ki te whiwhi i tēnei puka, e puta ana ki te take o te pata wai me ētahi atu tinana kūtere ki te ngana rātau ki te whakamārama i a rātau anō. Na, kaore tētahi tangata e rangirua nā nga tinana o te rangi tēnei āhua. ...
Koia i tua atu i te ui te whenua, no te mea e pehi ana i nga taha katoa i runga i tona waenganui. Ahakoa i te take o nga hua o nga maunga me nga pōreareatanga o nga awaawa kāore e taea te mārama ki te porohita tino tika, engari kaore tēnei e pā ki te āhua o te whenua. ...
E ai ki te mea kua whakaaturia kētia kei te whenua te āhua o tētahi rohe, me whakaaro tātau mēnā ka rite tonu te nekeneke ki tēnei āhua, ā, he aha te wāhi e mau ana te whenua i te ao nui. ... Ko te nuinga o nga kaituhi e whakaae ana e tū tonu ana te whenua i waenganui o te ao nui, me te whakaaro e kore e taea, e wawau ana ki te whakaaro i te tauaro. Ki te āta paunatia ia taua mea, ka kitea kahore ano kia whakataua te pātai, a kahore he tikanga kia marama te whakaaro. Ko ia huringa o te wāhi e mātakina ana, arā, ki tētahi nekehanga o te ahanoa i kitea, o te kaitirotiro rānei, ki ngā nekenekehanga rānei a ngā mea e rua. ... Na no te whenua e kitea ai te hurihanga o nga rangi, a ka hanga mo o tatou kanohi Na, ki te kore te whenua e whai i te nekehanga o tenei nekehanga ki nga mea katoa i waho o te whenua, engari ki te ahunga hangai atu i te mea ka neke nga mea katoa i runga i te whenua, a ko tenei ahua te hurihanga o ia ra. Nā reira ko tēnei te āhua nei he pānga ki te ao nui katoa, arā, ko ngā mea katoa i waho o te whenua me te okotahi kotahi o te whenua anō. Ahakoa rā, mehemea, me whakaae tētahi ehara tēnei nekeneke i te mea motuhake ki te rangi, engari i hurihuri te whenua mai i te uru ki te rāwhiti, ā, mehemea i āta whakaarotia tēnei mo te pikinga me te tautuhitanga o te rā, te marama me ngā whetū, ka kitea ko tēnei te āhuatanga tūturu."
Ko Nicolas Copernicus, ko nga hurihanga o nga tinana o te rangi, e 1543
Tērā pea ka whakamahia te whakawhitinga hei whakaaturanga i rerekē ai a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu, a Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia rerekē a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia pērā
A.he āhua kore noa iho nga kōmo
B.He tūturu te Ao
C.he pateko te papawhenua
D.Kāore te Ao i te noho ā-whare
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai ko:

C. he pateko te papawhenua

I roto i te kōrero a Copernicus, ka whakaatu ia i te whakaaro rerekē mai i ngā tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna wā. Ko ngā tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian i whakapono he pateko te papawhenua, arā, kāore te whenua e neke. Engari, i huatau mai a Copernicus kia rerekē tēnei whakaaro, ā, i kī ia kei te neke te whenua, ā, ko tēnei nekehanga te take e kitea ai te hurihanga o ngā rangi. Na reira, ko te rerekētanga matua i waenganui i a Copernicus me ngā tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian ko te whakaaro mō te pateko o te papawhenua.

Question:

B.E kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.

Question:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua
A.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 4
B.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3
C.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 1
D.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1, arā, ka kitea e te pūoko 10% o ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, ka kitea e te pūoko e 10 ngā whakaahua (0.1 × 100 = 10).

Ko te whakataka (standard deviation) o te maha o ngā whakaahua ka kitea e te pūoko ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te ture Poisson mō ngā huihuinga matapōkere. Ko te whakataka Poisson mō te maha o ngā huihuinga ka taea te tātai mā te pakiaka o te tau toharite o ngā huihuinga.

I tēnei wā, ko te tau toharite o ngā whakaahua ka kitea e te pūoko ko 10. Nō reira, ko te whakataka (rms) ka taea te tātai mā te pakiaka o 10, arā, ko te pakiaka o 10 he tata ki te 3.16.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:

B. e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3

Question:
Ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka e whakaaturia ana, e whakaaturia ana,
A.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me tōna wā o nāianei.
B.Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.
C.Ko te ōwehenga o tēnei wā ki tōna kōkuhutanga.
D.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika mō te pātai e pā ana ki te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka (inductor) ko:

D. ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.

I roto i te kaitaka, ko te ngaohiko e whakawaia ana (induced voltage) e pā ana ki te tere o te huringa o te iahiko (current) mā roto i te kaitaka. Ko te ture e pā ana ki tēnei ko te ture o Faraday mō te whakawehewehe (induction), ā, ka taea te whakaatu i te whārite e whai ake nei:

\[ V = L \frac{dI}{dt} \]

kei reira:
- \( V \) ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia,
- \( L \) ko te kōkuhutanga (inductance),
- \( \frac{dI}{dt} \) ko te mokatere o te huringa o te iahiko (rate of change of current).

Nā reira, ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.

Question:
Kai roto te kura i te āhua o te porotoru. Mēnā he rohe tapawhā 116 waewae tapawhā tō te pūtake tapatoru, ā, e 30 waewae te roa o te kura, e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Me tātai tātou i te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura. Ko te kura he āhua porotoru, ā, me kimi tātou i te rōrahi o tēnei porotoru.

Tuatahi, me kimi tātou i te rahi o te pūtake o te porotoru. E mōhiotia ana he tapawhā te rohe o te pūtake, ā, ko te rahi o te rohe tapawhā he 116 waewae tapawhā.

Ko te rōrahi o te porotoru ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te tātai nei:
\[ V = A \times h \]
kei reira:
- \( V \) te rōrahi
- \( A \) te rohe o te pūtake
- \( h \) te teitei o te porotoru

Kua hoatu te rohe o te pūtake (\( A \)) he 116 waewae tapawhā, ā, ko te teitei (\( h \)) he 30 waewae.

Nā reira:
\[ V = 116 \, \text{waewae tapawhā} \times 30 \, \text{waewae} \]
\[ V = 3480 \, \text{waewae pūtoru} \]

Nō reira, ko te rōrahi o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī katoa he 3480 waewae pūtoru.

Ko te whakautu tika ko:
C. 3480 ft^3

Question:
Kimihia te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te y = 1/2 me te y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Hei kimi i te roanga o te ānau \( y = \ln x \) i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) me te \( y = 1 \), me kimi tuatahi ngā uara o \( x \) e hāngai ana ki ēnei uara o \( y \).

1. Mō \( y = \frac{1}{2} \):
   \[
   \ln x = \frac{1}{2}
   \]
   \[
   x = e^{\frac{1}{2}} = \sqrt{e}
   \]

2. Mō \( y = 1 \):
   \[
   \ln x = 1
   \]
   \[
   x = e
   \]

Ināianei, me whakamahi te tātai mō te roanga o te ānau:
\[
L = \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{dy}{dx} \right)^2} \, dx
\]

I te mea ko \( y = \ln x \), ko te pātōtanga:
\[
\frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{1}{x}
\]

Nā reira, ko te roanga o te ānau:
\[
L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{1}{x} \right)^2} \, dx
\]
\[
L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]
\[
L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{\frac{x^2 + 1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]
\[
L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + 1}}{x} \, dx
\]

Ka taea te whakamahi i te huringa \( x = e^t \), nā reira \( dx = e^t \, dt \), ā, ka huri ngā rohe:
- Mō \( x = \sqrt{e} \), \( t = \frac{1}{2} \)
- Mō \( x = e \), \( t = 1 \)

Nā reira, ka rerekē te tātai hei:
\[
L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \frac{\sqrt{e^{2t} + 1}}{e^t} e^t \, dt
\]
\[
L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{e^{2t} + 1} \, dt
\]

Ka taea te tātai i tēnei whārite mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga, ā, ka whiwhi tātou i te uara tata:
\[
L \approx 0.53
\]

Nā reira, ko te whakautu ko:
A. 0.53

Question:
Kimi $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
To solve the expression \(-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}}\), we need to simplify each part step by step.

First, simplify \(-\dfrac{1}{-3}\):
\[
-\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}
\]

Next, simplify \(\cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}}\):
\[
\cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = \cfrac{1}{-3} = -3
\]

Now, we multiply the two simplified parts together:
\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = \dfrac{1 \cdot (-3)}{3} = \dfrac{-3}{3} = -1
\]

Therefore, the value of the expression is \(-1\).

The correct answer is:
B. -1

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei ka kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā?
A.He tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori.
B.He nui ake nga reti o te pakeke.
C.He kararehe taka o nga taonga pūmatua.
D.Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te kōwhiringa e kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā ko te kōwhiringa D: "Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena."

Anei he whakamārama mō ngā kōwhiringa katoa:

A. **He tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori**: Ka taea e te tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori te whakapiki i te tupu o te ohaoha i te wā poto, engari i te wā roa, ka taea e tēnei te arahi ki te korekore o ngā rawa maori, ka pā kino ki te ohaoha.

B. **He nui ake nga reti o te pakeke**: Ahakoa ka taea e ngā reti o te pakeke te whakapiki i te oranga o ngā pakeke, kāore pea tēnei e whai pānga nui ki te tupu o te ohaoha i te wā roa.

C. **He kararehe taka o nga taonga pūmatua**: Ko te kararehe taka o ngā taonga pūmatua ka taea te whakaheke i te uara o ngā rawa, ā, ka pā kino ki te tupu o te ohaoha.

D. **Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena**: Ko ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena ka taea te akiaki i te penapena me te haumi, ka taea te whakapiki i te tupu o te ohaoha i te wā roa. Mā te whakaheke i ngā tāke, ka nui ake te moni kei roto i ngā ringaringa o ngā tāngata me ngā pakihi, ka taea te whakapiki i te haumi me te whakapau moni, ā, ka whai hua ki te tupu o te ohaoha.

Nā reira, ko te kōwhiringa D te mea e kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā.

Question:
Kai roto te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu. Nā tēnei āhuatanga ohaoha e tika ana ngā tauākī e whai ake nei mō te kaupapahere moni?
A.Ma te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.
B.Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.
C.Ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.
D.Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.
GivenAnswer:
I roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu, ka taea te arotake i ngā tauākī mō te kaupapahere moni e whai ake nei:

A. **Ma te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.**
   - Ehara tēnei i te tauākī tika. Ko te kaupapa here tūmanako (expansionary monetary policy) ka taea te whakanui i te tono rōpū, engari kāore e tika ana ka whakararuraru te hōnore anake. Ko te whāinga matua o te kaupapa here tūmanako ko te whakanui i te mahi me te whakapiki i te ohanga.

B. **Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.**
   - He tauākī tika tēnei. Mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni, ka taea e te kaupapahere tūmanako te whakanui ake i te tono rōpū mā te whakaheke i te mokatere huamoni, ka whakatenatena i te whakapau moni me te haumi.

C. **Ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.**
   - Ehara tēnei i te tauākī tika. Ko te kaupapahere kirimana (contractionary monetary policy) ka whai wāhi ki te whakaheke i te tono rōpū mā te piki ake i te mokatere huamoni, ka taea te whakaheke i te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.

D. **Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.**
   - He tauākī tika tēnei. Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni (high liquidity preference), ka taea e te kaupapahere moni whakanui (expansionary monetary policy) te whakapai ake i te ohanga mā te whakanui i te rahi o te moni kei te pūnaha, ka taea te whakaiti i te mokatere huamoni me te whakanui i te tono rōpū.

Nā reira, ko ngā tauākī B me D e tika ana mō te kaupapahere moni i roto i te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu.

Question:
Tāutua te āhuatanga o te tono here e whai ake nei: Ka toa anake ngā Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi.
A.Kaore nga Aardvarks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.

C.Kaore nga Chipmunks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.

GivenAnswer:
Tāutua te āhuatanga o te tono here e whai ake nei: Ka toa anake ngā Pī i tā rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi.

Ko te tikanga o tēnei tono here, ko te mea anake ka taea e ngā Pī te toa i tā rātau kēmu tuatahi, mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi. Arā, mēnā ka toa ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei, kāore ngā Pī e toa.

D. Kaore nga Aardvarks, nga Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātau kēmu tuatahi.

Ko tēnei kōwhiringa anake e whakatutuki ana i te tono here, nā te mea e kī ana kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa, ā, nā reira ka taea ngā Pī te toa i tā rātau kēmu tuatahi.

Question:
Whakaritea te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, rongoā. (Ko te Ka for phenol ko te 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakarite i te ārohi H⁺(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol (C₆H₅OH) rongoā, me whakamahi tātou i te uara Ka o te phenol. Ko te Ka o te phenol ko te 1 × 10⁻¹⁰.

Ko te whārite mō te ionization o te phenol i roto i te wai ko:
\[ \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH} \rightleftharpoons \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^- + \text{H}^+ \]

Ka taea te tuhi te Ka hei:
\[ K_a = \frac{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^-][\text{H}^+]}{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH}]} \]

I te tīmatanga, ko te ārohi o te phenol ko 1.0 M, ā, kāore he C₆H₅O⁻ rānei H⁺ i te tīmatanga. Kia kīia te ārohi o te H⁺ i te ekenga ki te taurite ko \( x \). Nā reira, ka heke te ārohi o te phenol ki \( 1.0 - x \), ā, ka piki te ārohi o te C₆H₅O⁻ me te H⁺ ki \( x \).

Nā reira, ka taea te tuhi te Ka hei:
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{x \cdot x}{1.0 - x} \]

I te mea he tino iti te uara o te Ka, ka taea te whakapae ko \( 1.0 - x \approx 1.0 \). Nā reira, ka taea te whakangāwari i te whārite hei:
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{x^2}{1.0} \]
\[ x^2 = 1 \times 10^{-10} \]
\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]
\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

Nā reira, ko te ārohi o te H⁺(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol rongoā ko:
\[ \boxed{1 \times 10^{-5} \text{ M}} \]

Ko te whakautu tika ko te D.

Question:
Tauākī 1 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Tauākī 2 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Pono, Pono
B.Teka, teka
C.Pono, False
D.Pono
GivenAnswer:
Let's analyze each statement in the context of group theory.

**Statement 1: In a group, \((ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}\).**

To verify this, we need to understand the properties of inverses in a group. For any elements \(a\) and \(b\) in a group, the inverse of the product \(ab\) is given by:
\[
(ab)^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}
\]
Applying this property twice, we get:
\[
(ab)^{-2} = ((ab)^{-1})^2 = (b^{-1}a^{-1})^2 = b^{-1}a^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}
\]
On the other hand, \(b^{-2}a^{-2}\) is:
\[
b^{-2}a^{-2} = (b^{-1})^2(a^{-1})^2 = b^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}a^{-1}
\]
Clearly, \(b^{-1}a^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1} \neq b^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}a^{-1}\) in general, unless \(a\) and \(b\) commute (i.e., \(ab = ba\)). Therefore, the statement \((ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}\) is not true in general for all groups.

**Statement 2: In a group, \((ab)^n = a^n b^n\).**

To verify this, we need to consider the general properties of group elements raised to a power. For any elements \(a\) and \(b\) in a group, \((ab)^n\) is generally not equal to \(a^n b^n\) unless \(a\) and \(b\) commute. In general, the expression \((ab)^n\) expands using the binomial theorem for groups, which involves terms that mix \(a\) and \(b\) in a specific way depending on the commutation relations between \(a\) and \(b\).

Therefore, the statement \((ab)^n = a^n b^n\) is not true in general for all groups.

Given the analysis above, both statements are false in general group theory.

The correct answer is:
B. Teka, teka

Question:
I roto i te xy-plane, ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x ko
A.te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B.he ānau kati
C.he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
D.he ira kotahi
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia tātarihia te pātai nei.

Ko te whārite \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \) kei roto i te xy-plane. Ka taea te tātari i tēnei whārite mā te whakamahi i ngā āhuatanga o ngā logarithms.

Ka tīmata tātou mā te tango i te logarithm o ngā taha e rua o te whārite:
\[ \log(x^{\log y}) = \log(y^{\log x}) \]

Mā te whakamahi i te ture o te logarithm, arā, \(\log(a^b) = b \log(a)\), ka whiwhi tātou:
\[ (\log y) \log x = (\log x) \log y \]

Ka taea te kite he ōrite ngā taha e rua o te whārite, nō reira ka taea te kī:
\[ (\log y) \log x = (\log x) \log y \]

Ka taea te whakakore i ngā logarithms, ā, ka whiwhi tātou i te whārite:
\[ \log y = \log x \]

Nō reira, ka taea te kī:
\[ y = x \]

Nō reira, ko te kauwhata o te whārite \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \) he rārangi e haere ana i te tapawhā tuatahi, arā, ko te rārangi \( y = x \).

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
C. he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana

Question:
Mā te tere tuatahi o te 1.5 × te 10^6 m/s, ka tomo tētahi proton ki tētahi rohe o te āpure hautō taimau 1.5 T. Mēnā ka hangaia e te tere tuatahi o te proton tētahi koki o te 30° me te āpure hautō, ka whakararuraru i te tere o te 4 o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Kia whakautu i tēnei pātai, me mātua mārama tātou ki te pānga o te āpure hautō ki te tere o te proton. Ka whakamahia e tātou te ariā o te nekehanga o te korakora i roto i te āpure hautō.

Ka uru te proton ki te āpure hautō me te tere tuatahi o te 1.5 × 10^6 m/s i tētahi koki o te 30° ki te āpure hautō. Ko te āpure hautō he 1.5 T.

Ko te tere o te proton ka taea te wehea ki ngā wāhanga e rua:
1. Te wāhanga e tika ana ki te āpure hautō (v_parallel)
2. Te wāhanga e whakapae ana ki te āpure hautō (v_perpendicular)

Ka taea te tatau i ēnei wāhanga e rua mā te whakamahi i te koki 30°:
- v_parallel = v * cos(30°)
- v_perpendicular = v * sin(30°)

Ko te tere tuatahi o te proton (v) = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Nā reira:
- v_parallel = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s * cos(30°) = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s * (√3/2) ≈ 1.5 × 10^6 m/s * 0.866 ≈ 1.3 × 10^6 m/s
- v_perpendicular = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s * sin(30°) = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s * 0.5 = 0.75 × 10^6 m/s

Ko te wāhanga v_parallel kāore e pāngia e te āpure hautō, nō reira ka noho pūmau te wāhanga nei. Ko te wāhanga v_perpendicular ka hanga i tētahi nekehanga porohita i roto i te āpure hautō, engari kāore e pāngia te tere o te proton.

Nā reira, ko te tere katoa o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te āpure hautō ka noho pūmau, arā, 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu ko:
C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā mea e whai ake nei e whakamārama ana i te āhuatanga i muri i te whakarewatanga o te utu i runga i tētahi hua e hiahiatia ana e te tāwari?

Question:

Question:

Question:
I roto i tēhea wāhi o te pānga tūmatanui, tērā pea ka whakaurua te hononga?

GivenAnswer:

Ko ngā take tūmatanui he wāhi nui mō te whakawhitiwhiti kōrero me te mahi tahi i waenga i ngā rōpū rerekē hei whakapai ake i te oranga o te hapori.

Question:
I mua i te whakatakotoranga o tētahi kaupapa kia hanumi i ngā taone e rua ki runga i te pōti, ka tukuna e te rōia o te kāwanatanga he whakaaro tohutohu e kī ana kāore te mehua, i tōna whakaaro, e takahi ana i ngā whakarato ā-ture, ā-ture rānei. I muri iho, ka whakatakotoria te kaupapa ki runga i te pōti, a, ka tino puta i nga kaipōti i nga taone e rua. I muri i te pōti, engari i mua i te whakahaeretanga o te whakakotahitanga, tokorua nga kaihautū o tētahi o ngā taone i tīmata i te hūtu ki te whakauru i te haumitanga, ka whakaekea te kaupapa o te kaupapa. I tae atu te hūtu ki te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga, a, i kitea he kaupapa ā ture i raro i te kāwanatanga me te ture a te hau. Ināianei ka kōnaetia e nga kaiwhakapae he mōtini e rapu ana kia arotakea tēnei pāhi e te Kōti Matua o U. S. Tērā pea ka taea e te Kōti te kōti
A.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, no te mea i whakataua i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua.
B.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, engari tērā pea i whakahokia ki te kōti o te rohe o te hau.
C.whakarongo ki nga take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.
D.E whakawhirinaki ana ki te whakaaro tohutohu i tāhuahuatia e te rōia o te kāwanatanga, a, kaore e rongo i te take mo ōna painga.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko:

A. Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, no te mea i whakataua i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua.

Ko te take i kore ai te Kōti Matua o te U.S. e rongo i te kēhi, ko te mea i whakataua te take i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua. Ko te tikanga, ko ngā kōti ā-rohe me ngā kōti ā-motu te hunga e whakatau ana i ngā take e pā ana ki ngā ture ā-rohe me ngā ture ā-motu. Mēnā kāore he take ā-ture ā-motu e pā ana ki te kaupapa, kāore te Kōti Matua o te U.S. e whai mana ki te arotake i taua take.

Question:
Ko te kaitono tuhituhi he Mehikihi-Amerika, ā, ko te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana e ia he whiringa nui o nga kaipōti o Mehikihi kia whiwhi ai i te pōti. Ko te hua, ko tana kaiwhakahaere whakahau, ka whakatau kia mēra ki ia kaipōti o Mehikihi kua rēhitatia he whakapiripiri roimata, e mau ana i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono e whakahaere ana a ia. I te mea he tokomaha nga tāngata māori o Mehikihi kāore i te mōhio ki te pānui me te tuhituhi Ingarihi, e whakapono ana te kaiwhakahaere whakahau he uaua ki te tokomaha o nga kaipōti te tuhi i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono i runga i te pōti. Ko te hua, kua whakatūria e te kaiwhakahaere whakahau tētahi whakahau pāpāho whānui hei whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaipōti me pēhea te hoatu i ngā whakapiri ki te pōti. E rima marama i mua i te pōti ka whakamōhiotia e tētahi mana pōti te komiti whakahau a te kaitono kāore nga whakapiri roimata e ū ana ki te tikanga o te kāwanatanga. I roto i tana reta, ka whakamārama te mana ko nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga, he whakaaro tērā e hiahiatia ana e nga kaipōti tūpono ki te tuhi waituhi i te ingoa o te kaitono. Na reira, ka whakamutua e ia kaore nga whakapiripiri e ū ana ki nga whakaritenga ā-ture. E toru wiki i muri iho, ka whakaputaina e te kaitono te hūtu i te kōti o te rohe o te kāwanatanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ko to rātau whakamāramatanga o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga e takahi ana i te Kaupapa Ture o U. S. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei, mēnā ka whakatūria, ka whakaritea te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga?
A.Neke atu i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti i waenganui i ngā kaipōti o Amerika i rēhitatia, kāore i te iti iho i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti.
B.E hiahiatia ana e tētahi tikanga kāwanatanga kia whakarahia ia wāhi pōti ki tētahi pene waituhi hei whakangāwari i te tuhituhi i roto i ngā pōti.
C.Nā te nuinga o ngā pōti tuhi-mai e whakanui ake ana i te wā e hiahiatia ana hei tatau i ngā pōti katoa, me maka aua pōti i runga i te āhua ōrite.
D.He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga, ko te kōwhiringa:

D. He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.

Ko te take i tēnei kōwhiringa e tino kaha ana, nā te mea e pā ana ki te āwangawanga nui o te kāwanatanga mō te pono me te tika o te pūnaha pōti. Mēnā ka taea e ngā kaipōti te whakamahi i ngā whakapiripiri hei tuhi i te ingoa o te kaitono, ka taea pea te tinihanga, te whakamahi i ngā whakapiripiri rūpahu, me te whakangāwari i te tukanga pōti. Ko te āwangawanga mō te tinihanga pōti he take nui e taea ana te whakamahi hei tautoko i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga.

Question:
E ai ki a Nussbaum, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa
A.He rawaka mo te ahanoa tōkai.
B.e hiahiatia ana mō te ahanoa tōkai.
C.kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai.
D.ko ngā mea katoa o runga.
GivenAnswer:
C. kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai.

E ai ki a Martha Nussbaum, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai. Ko te ahanoa tōkai (objectification) he tukanga e titiro ai tētahi ki tētahi atu hei mea noa iho, kāore e aro ana ki tōna mana tangata, ki ōna kare ā-roto, me ōna hiahia. Nō reira, kāore i te tika te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa.

Question:
Hei whakahauhau i te whakaurunga kāreti, ka tukua e tētahi āhua he waihotanga tāke e $200 mō ngā tāke ā rohe mō te hunga he tauira wā katoa i ngā kura i roto i te kāwanatanga. E whakaaetia tonutia ana ngā ākonga wahine e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā ki tētahi waihotanga tāke $100, ā, kua kore ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā e whakaaetia he waihotanga tāke. Ko tēhea o ēnei e tino whakarāpopoto ana i te ture tika o te ture ā-ture e pā ana ki te waihotanga tāke ā rohe mō ngā ākonga e whakauru ana i te hāwhe wā?
A.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei whakakāhoretanga i te tukanga tika.
B.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.
C.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te rohe o te tukanga tika nui.
D.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te mana o te whenua ki te tāke i nga wāhanga rerekē o te tangata.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko:

Ko te take i tēnei ko te mea kei te rerekē te āhua o te waihotanga tāke i runga i te ira tangata, ā, ka taea te kī he tūkino tēnei i te wāhanga parenga ōrite i raro i te ture. Ko te whakarato i ngā waihotanga tāke rerekē mō ngā ākonga wahine me ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā, ka taea te kī he mahi whakatoihara i runga i te ira tangata, ā, kāore e tika ana i raro i ngā ture e pā ana ki te parenga ōrite.

Question:
I whiwhi nga pirihimana i tētahi aki mai i tētahi kaitiaki pono kai te mahi te tangata i te rongoā i tōna kāinga. Kātahi ka tukuna atu e nga āpiha ki te kaiwhakawā he oati tautohe e whakaatu ana i te take tūpono mo te whakaputa i tētahi whakamana rapu. Ka tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he whakamana rapu mo nga rongoā rongoā i te wāhitau o te tangata. Ka haere nga āpiha pirihimana ki te kāinga o taua tangata, a, ka tangi i te pere tatau. No te korenga o tētahi tangata e whakautu, ka pakaru nga pirihimana, a, ka tomo ki te nohoanga. I rapua e rātau nga rūma i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, kaore i kitea he whakaaturanga whakararuraru, kātahi ka haere ki waho, a, ka kite i tētahi tomokanga motuhake e ahu ana ki te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka piki atu rātau ki te huarahi, a, ka tomo ki roto i te rūma moe. I roto i te rūma ka kitea e nga āpiha he rehu o te hīkaka e takoto ana i runga i te kākahu. I a rātau e haere tonu ana nga āpiha ki te rapu i te rūma moe, ka tomo te tangata whakapae ki te rūma. Ka pātai atu nga pirihimana ki te tangata whakapae mehemea ko ia te tangata. Ka kitea e te tangata whakapae a ia, a, ka kī atu ki nga pirihimana kai roto rātau i tōna rūma moe, a, ka nohoia e ia te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka whakamātauria e te tangata whakapae e noho ana te tangata i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, i wehea ōna wāhi ora i te hunga whakapae. Ahakoa rā, i whakatakotoria te tangata whakapae ki raro i te hopu, a, ka whakahaua ki te pupuri i te rongoā. Kua whakaputaina e te tangata whakapae he mōtini hai aukati i te hīkaka kia kore ai e whakaaetia ki te whakaaturanga. Ko te tikanga ko te mōtini a te tangata whakapae ko
A.I tukuna, no te mea kaore te whakamana i whakaingoa i te hunga whakapae.
B.I tukuna, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.
C.Ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.
D.I whakakāhore, nā te mea he tika te whakamana, a, ka tukuna atu he take tūpono.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tikanga ko te mōtini a te tangata whakapae ko:

B. I tukuna, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.

Ko te take i tukuna ai te mōtini a te tangata whakapae nā te mea kāore te whakamana rapu i te āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua. I roto i tēnei āhuatanga, i rapua e nga pirihimana te papa tuarua o te nohoanga, ā, kāore i te mārama mehemea i kapi te whakamana rapu i taua wāhi. Mēnā kāore te whakamana i te tino mārama, ka taea te kī he takahi i ngā tika o te tangata whakapae, ā, ka taea te aukati i ngā taunakitanga i kitea i taua wāhi.

Question:
Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He maha nga stomata
B.Ngā tapahi Thin
C.Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau
D.Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui
GivenAnswer:
Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko tēnei e whai ake nei:

C. Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau

Ko ngā āmio (spines) he urutaunga motuhake o ngā tipu e noho ana i ngā taiao maroke, pērā i ngā kākātaraha (cacti). Ka āwhina ngā āmio ki te whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai mā te whakaiti i te mata o te tipu e pāngia ana e te rā, ā, ka ārai hoki i te ngaromanga wai mā te pupuri i te haumākū o te hau e tata ana ki te tipu. Ko ngā rau, i te nuinga o te wā, he nui ake te ngaromanga wai nā te mea he nui ake te mata e pāngia ana e te rā me te hau.

Question:
Ko te take o tētahi akoranga taurua, akoranga taurua rānei ko:

GivenAnswer:

Question:

A.E rāhuitia ana nga tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki nga kiritaki rongoā o mua i raro i nga āhuatanga katoa.

Question:

A.Hegemony
B.Te āhuatanga o te huarahi huarahi

Question:

Question:

Question:
Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000. Nā te kānataraki kaiako hou, e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000. He aha te ine mahora hou o nga uara o nga whare i te taone?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakatau i te ine mahora hou o ngā uara o ngā whare i te taone, me whai whakaaro tātou ki te pānga o te pikinga o ngā uara o ngā whare ki te ine mahora.

Ko te ine mahora o ngā uara o ngā whare i tēnei wā he $23,000. Ina piki ngā uara katoa o ngā whare e $5,000, ka piki hoki te ine mahora o ngā uara o ngā whare.

Ko te ine mahora hou ka tāpirihia te $5,000 ki te ine mahora o nāianei:

\[ \text{Ine mahora hou} = \text{Ine mahora o nāianei} + \text{Pikinga} \]

\[ \text{Ine mahora hou} = 23,000 + 5,000 \]

\[ \text{Ine mahora hou} = 28,000 \]

Nō reira, ko te ine mahora hou o ngā uara o ngā whare i te taone ko te $28,000.

Ko te whakautu ko:
C. $28,000

Question:

GivenAnswer:

Question:
Kātahi anō ka whakatuwhera anō te hokomaha i muri i te katinga o te rua wiki mo nga whakatikatikatanga. I te ata o te whakatuwhera anō, ka hokohoko tētahi wahine i tana takanga ohorere, a, ka pā ki te waewae pakaru. I muri iho, ka whiua e te wahine te hokomaha mo nga mate whaiaro. I roto i tōna hūtu, ka kī te wahine kua haere a ia ki runga i tētahi pākete peita e takoto ana i roto i tētahi o nga ara. I te whakawātanga, ka karangatia e te wahine tētahi atu kiritaki hai whakaatu, i a ia e hokohoko ana, ka rongo a ia i te thud, ka huri, ka kite i te wahine e taka ana i runga i te papa. I whakaaturia hoki e ia i kite a ia i tētahi pākete peita wātea e takoto ana i ētahi waewae ruarua i te waewae o te wahine. I runga i te whakamātautau whakawhiti, ka uru te kiritaki ki tētahi whakawhitinga tautohe ki te rōia o te hokomaha. No te pātaitanga ki tōna whakaaro he aha te take o te hinganga o te wahine, ka whakaaturia e te kiritaki, "I hinga a ia nā te mea i haere a ia ki runga i te pākete. " Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki te whakamātautau whakawhiti, kaore tonu a ia i kite i te haerenga o te wahine i runga i te pākete. Kātahi ka pātai atu te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki i te pātai e whai ake nei:"Ki te kore koe e kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea koe e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira?" Ka whakautua e te kiritaki, "Nā te mea i kōrero mai taku kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana me au ā muri ake ka kite a ia i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete. " Ka neke te rōia o te hokomaha ki te tuki i te whakautu whakamutunga a te kiritaki. Ki te whakakorea e te kaiwhakawā whakawā te mōtini a te tangata whakapae, ā, ka whakaaetia te whakautu a te kiritaki kia tū, tērā pea nā te mea
A.I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.
B.I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.
C.Ko te whakautu a te kiritaki he kōrero mo te whakaaro o mua tata nei.
D.He ariā mōhio te whakautu a te kiritaki i tēnei wā.

Question:
Kei tēnei mana whakahaere te tikanga hara e whai ake nei:"Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. " I tētahi ahiahi, he pēpi te tangata whakapae i tana irāmutu e rima tau. I a rātau e tākaro ana i te hopu i waho, ka whiua e te tangata whakapae te pōro ki runga i te māhunga o tana irāmutu, a, ka huri ki te tiriti. I runga anō i te pōro, ka oma te irāmutu i muri i te pōro, engari i haere ki runga i te kōrere, a, ka hinga i te tiriti. No tana haerenga, ka tino rere te irāmutu i tōna raparapa, a, kaore i taea te tū ake. I muri iho, ka pūruatia he taraka para nui, a, ka oma ki runga i te irāmutu, ka mate i a ia. Ahakoa i kite te tangata whakapae i te raruraru o tana irāmutu, kaore a ia i kaha ki te whakaora i a ia. Nō muri iho, ka whakataua te tangata whakapae ki te tangata hara. I te whakawātanga, ka whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere a ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, a, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. I muri i te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tohunga mo te whakangungu i te āhua o te āhua i whakaahuatia e te hunga whakapae, ehara i te rerekē ina puta he takahanga mōrearea. A.I te mate te tangata whakapae i te tapu rangitahi.
B.Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.
C.Ehara i te mea noa iho te rahunga o te tangata whakapae ki te mahi.
D.Na tērā o te atekōkiri taraka i whakararuraru te taunaha hara a te tangata whakapae.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te kōrero e whakaahuatia ana e koe e pā ana ki te āhuatanga o te tangata whakapae i te wā i pā te aitua ki tana irāmutu. I runga i te whakamārama o te mana whakahaere e kī ana "Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture," me te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga, ko te kōwhiringa e tika ana ko:

B. Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.

Ko te take mō tēnei kōwhiringa ko te mea i whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere ia, ā, kāore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. Mēnā ka whakapono te hūri ki tēnei whakaaturanga, ka taea te kī atu kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture i taua wā. Nā reira, kāore i hiahiatia e ia te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mō te kōmihana o te hara.

Question:
Ko te tangata te rangatira o te hōtēra hou i hangaia i roto i te taone. I te 15 o Poutāpeta, ka whiwhi waea taua tangata mai i tētahi kaihoko, he kaiwhakanoa taonga hōtēra. Question:

Question:
Ka kitea e te kaimahi o te umanga whakanao nui te mahi, a, ka whai i te mahi mo te moni anake. He iti noa iho te mahi a te kaimahi, ā, kāore i te tino whakahauhautia kia tino nui rawa, kia pai ake rānei te kounga. E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a F. Herzberg, ko te huarahi pai rawa atu o te 10 e whakanui ake ana i te whakahauhau a tēnei kaimahi, ko te tikanga kia
A.tukuna he utu whakarewa me te tohutohu mō te hua nui ake
B.hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi
C.whakanui ake i ngā huarahi mō te tauwhitinga pāpori mōhiotia
D.whakarato tai mahi ki te kaimahi e mau ana i te mana nui ake
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a Frederick Herzberg, ka taea te wehewehe i ngā āhuatanga e pā ana ki te mahi ki ngā "āhuatanga whakahauhau" me ngā "āhuatanga whakakāore i te pai." Ko ngā āhuatanga whakahauhau e pā ana ki te āhua o te mahi ake, ā, ka taea te whakanui ake i te pai me te whakahauhau o te kaimahi. Ko ngā āhuatanga whakakāore i te pai, i te nuinga o te wā, e pā ana ki ngā āhuatanga o te taiao mahi, pēnei i te utu me ngā tikanga mahi, ā, ka taea te whakaiti i te kore pai engari kāore e tino whakanui ake i te whakahauhau.

I roto i tēnei horopaki, ko te huarahi pai rawa atu hei whakanui ake i te whakahauhau a tēnei kaimahi ko te:

B. hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi

Ko te hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi ka taea te whakanui ake i te whakahauhau mā te whakarato i ngā wero hou, ngā whai wāhitanga mō te tipu whaiaro, me te āhua o te mahi e pai ake ai te kaimahi ki te mahi. Ka taea hoki te whakanui ake i te mana motuhake me te whai wāhitanga ki te whakatau kaupapa, e ai ki ngā āhuatanga whakahauhau a Herzberg.

Ko te whiringa A (tukuna he utu whakarewa me te tohutohu mō te hua nui ake) he āhuatanga whakakāore i te pai, ā, kāore pea e tino whakanui ake i te whakahauhau i te wā roa. Ko te whiringa C (whakanui ake i ngā huarahi mō te tauwhitinga pāpori mōhiotia) he āhuatanga whakakāore i te pai, ā, kāore pea e tino pā ki te whakahauhau. Ko te whiringa D (whakarato tai mahi ki te kaimahi e mau ana i te mana nui ake) ka taea te whai pānga pai, engari kāore pea e tino whai pānga ki te whakahauhau i te āhua o te mahi ake.

Question:

Heoi, kāore anō kia tino mārama te take, ā, me āta rangahau tonu.

B. I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei: Ko te whakapaunga miraka i te wā o te puberty kua kitea e whai pānga ana ki te piki ake o te kiato kohuke o te wheua, ā, ka taea pea te āwhina i te hauora o ngā wheua i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei.

C. E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati: Ko ētahi rangahau kua kite i tētahi hononga i waenga i te whakapaunga miraka me te iti iho o te tūpono mō ngā whati, nā te mea kei roto i te miraka ngā matū pērā i te konupūmā me te huaora D e hiahiatia ana mō te hauora o ngā wheua.

D. I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga: I ētahi whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o ngā whati, kua kitea pea he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te whakaheke i te tūpono mō ngā whati.

He mea nui kia mōhio ko ngā kitenga o ngā rangahau ka taea te rerekē, ā, me āta whakaaro hoki ki ngā āhuatanga pērā i te momo kai, te āhua noho, me ngā tikanga hauora o ia tangata. Me whai whakaaro tonu ki ngā tohutohu a ngā mātanga hauora mō te kai tika me te tiaki i te hauora o ngā wheua.
